creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: small oval basket with rectangular base; arcing, split handle with loop at top center; decorative knots across handle; woven external supports, with arcing supports at sides; closed weave; copper lined bamboo cylinder
marks: Signature incised bottom: [ 竹雲斎造之 ]
title: Boat-Shaped Hanging Flower Basket
